typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Plan_ID                             } as string,
		{Plan_Start_Date               } as string,
		{Plan_End_Date                    } as string,
		{Plan_Name_Description            } as string,
		{Line_Of_Business                  } as integer,
		{Plan_Product_Code                 } as string,
		{market_Type                       } as string,
		{Grandfathered_Plan_Flag              } as string,
		{Metal_level                        } as integer,
		{Acturial_Value } as integer,
		Issuer_State as string,
		Issuer_ID as string,
		Plan_On_Off_Exchange_Indicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive({Plan_End_Date                    } = toDate({Plan_End_Date                    },'dd/mm/yyyy'),
		{Plan_Start_Date               } = toDate({Plan_Start_Date               },'dd/mm/yyyy')) ~> StringtoDate
StringtoDate sink(input(
		Plan_ID as string,
		Plan_Start_Date as date,
		Plan_End_Date as date,
		Plan_Name_Description as string,
		Line_Of_Business as string,
		Plan_Product_Code as string,
		market_Type as string,
		Grandfathered_Plan_Flag as string,
		Metal_level as string,
		Acturial_Value as string,
		Issuer_State as string,
		Issuer_ID as string,
		Plan_On_Off_Exchange_Indicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
